Name: Run Away
About the game: Runaway is a challenging avoidance platformer, please help the little green robot to escape from a place full of deadly traps. The key is to win this game how good are you control the jump button and landing on the ground. Game Features 30 handcrafted levels. Optimized for mobile platform. Optimized player movement control. Mobile control buttons arrangeable. Gamepad supported (player movement only). Auto Save Level Progress. Retro Pixel Graphic. Retro-style platform gameplay.
